snippet: LONDON, Nov. 1--While the British had expected President Ismet Inonu of Turkey to be firm in his speech on foreign policy today, they were visibly pleased at the turn his comment took, especially at the reaffirmation of friendship ......

headline.main: BRITAIN WELCOMES TURKEY'S FIRMNESS; Renewed Pledge of Friendship and Intent to Follow Russia Are Especially Cheering

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 1--While the British had expected President Ismet Inonu of Turkey to be firm in his speech on foreign policy today, they were visibly pleased at the turn his comment took, especially at the reaffirmation of friendship ...
